title: Saints Alive! New Stories of Old Saints: Volume II Celtic Paths
description: From the author of the critically-acclaimed book "Saints Alive! New Stories of Old Saints: Volume I Saints of Empire" comes "Volume II: Celtic Paths." Indeed, Andrew Seddon delivers another powerful, thought-provoking book in this second volume of the series "Saints Alive! New Stories of Old Saints." "Celtic Paths" is sure to delight fans who have come to know Seddon is a gifted story-teller-an excellent hagiographer-and will undoubtedly engender a whole new generation of readers-young and old alike-who yearn for more substantive, engaging stories that teach and entertain.
author: Andrew M. Seddon
